meta.name: description
meta.content: Bay Head Elementary School is located in Bay Head, NJ.

div.div: Once A Shark, Always A Shark

img.alt: Stacked books with an apple on top

div.div: The school philosophy reflects the traditional three R's and adds a T, for keeping pace with technological learning. The Bay Head School creates a learning environment that fosters the curiosity, imagination, and intelligence of children. Our goal is to give children a comfortable environment in which to explore and learn about their world. We want our students to develop a love of learning that will give them the self-confidence and motivation to succeed in their lives. Our small class size enables us to accomplish our goals.

article.aria-label: CANCELLED-Baseball vs Spring Lake Heights / Antrim

h3.a: CANCELLED-Baseball vs Spring Lake Heights / Antrim

div.div: Bay Head Life is doing their first ever contest! Calling all Star Wars fans! In honor of Star Wars Day ( May 4th) Bay Head Life is asking you to build your own droid out of recycled materials! Enter by emailing them your name, age, brief description & function of your droid with photos to BayHeadLifeContests@gmail.com. All submissions need to be in by May 2nd. The LUCKY winner will be announced on May 4th and will win a 6 pack of Star Wars inspired cupcakes from Mueller's Bakery. Details are also available their our facebook and Instagram @BayHeadLife.

img.alt: Bay Head School's Traumatic Loss Protocol

div.div: Please view the presentation explaining Bay Head School's Traumatic Loss Protocols.

h3.a: Home and School Annual Flower Sale

div.div:
The Home and School Association is selling flowers for their spring fundraiser. Just in time for mother's day, orders can include flats, pots, and hanging baskets of a variety of flowers, vegetables, and herbs. Please see the order form for more details about pricing and plant varieties. Completed order forms need to be scanned, photographed, or simply listed out with specific flowers & cost total and emailed to: dolans00@aol.com or text: 732.581.4001.
Payment will be accepted through PayPal: sign into your PayPal account, type in bayheadschoolhsa@gmail.com and choose pay through friends and family OR checks can be mailed to: 149 Harding Road, Brick 08724. Please double check your math when paying!
Orders are due by April 10th. When I get your order I will confirm with you. Your order will not placed until payment is received.

April is Autism Awareness Month! Please read the full article for more information on raising awareness and acceptance of people with autism. Check out our Facebook Page @BayHeadElementarySchool and Instagram @bay.head.school for an Autism Awareness Challenge tomorrow April 2nd!

Please be aware that Kindergarten registration on Monday March 30th is postponed until further notice as well as any upcoming events or activities for Bay Head School. If you would like to register for Kindergarten for the 2020-2021 school year, please contact Mrs. Trainor at trainor@bayheadschool.org.
